name: seablock-liquidalloys
title: Seablock Liquid Alloy Mixing
author: DrakeSD
description: A fork of Marsonge's fix to Arangas's Alloy Mixing mod. Adds Alloy Mixer that is used to mix molten metals into alloys directly and explicitly enables some liquid metals that Seablock doesn't. Doesn't add remelting. Still supports ShinyAngelGFX.
